title: Manage a Paratransit Booking
description: An eligible passenger with a disability calls to book a door-to-door paratransit ride for a medical appointment.

tasks.description: Verify the passenger's eligibility for paratransit service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the passenger is a registered paratransit client.

tasks.description: Collect the trip details: date, time, origin, and destination.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records all trip information.

tasks.description: Book the trip in the paratransit scheduling system.
Provide the passenger with a pickup time window and a confirmation number for their trip.
tasks.expected_outcome: The passenger has all the necessary information for their booking.
